entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued April 30 at 2:47PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...RAIN AND SNOWMELT IS CAUSING NEAR RECORD FLOWS ON AREA RIVERS... A melting and moisture rich snowpack is causing rises on area rivers. Areas along rivers across northeast Minnesota, particularly along the Rainy, Big Fork, Little Fork, and Vermillion Rivers, to name a few, are approaching high flows. The Vermillion River at Crane Lake is nearing its record flow! While we don`t have official
